Polychrome

Located within: Oda

Aurolt

Acid & Agony

An arctic continent dominated by the Øyvklakk. The south is a wasteland, due to the presence of Phortrex Phrakko, a Gnallix resource extraction facility whose run-off has rendered the Øyvklakk oily and acidic. The north is Tundra, and home to the Durrhaic kingdom of Ardonnh.
